name: fuzzy-search
label: Fuzzy Search
description: Connector provides actions to search fuzzy word in string.

operations.title: Filter JSON by Key Value
operations.description: Filters JSON as per provided key value pair.

parameters.title: Record JSON
parameters.name: recordJSON
parameters.tooltip: Specify list of JSON or JSON to filter data.
parameters.description: Specify list of JSON or JSON to filter data.

parameters.title: Target Key Value
parameters.name: targetKeyValue
parameters.description: Specify target key's value for data filtering.
parameters.tooltip: Specify key value for data filtering.

parameters.title: Similarity Threshold
parameters.name: similarityThreshold
parameters.description: Specify threshold to match key value data in JSON.
parameters.tooltip: Specify threshold to match key value data in JSON.

true.name: cutoff
true.title: Cut Off
true.description: Specify cut off to filter data for Fuzzy Match.
true.tooltip: Specify cut off to filter data for Fuzzy Match.

parameters.title: Target Text
parameters.name: targetText
parameters.tooltip: Specify target text to search in.
parameters.description: Specify target text to search in.

parameters.title: Keyword To Search
parameters.name: keywordToSearch
parameters.tooltip: Specify keyword or list of keywords to search in Target Text.
parameters.description: Specify keyword or list of keywords to search in Target Text.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify limit to show keywords found in.
parameters.description: Specify limit to show keywords found in.

parameters.title: Cut Off
parameters.name: cutoff
parameters.tooltip: Specify cut off to filter data for Fuzzy Match.
parameters.description: Specify cut off to filter data for Fuzzy Match.
